content:
instance
  add_comp : ∀ (P Q R : C) (f f' : P ⟶ Q) (g : Q ⟶ R), (f + f') ≫ g = f ≫ g + f' ≫ g
  comp_add : ∀ (P Q R : C) (f : P ⟶ Q) (g g' : Q ⟶ R), f ≫ (g + g') = f ≫ g + f ≫ g'
attribute [instance] Preadditive.homGroup
end CategoryTheory
namespace CategoryTheory
namespace Preadditive
open AddMonoidHom
variable {C : Type u₁}
